name: Bargaining
description:
Content warning: Suicide, survivor's guilt, loss of sibling.

The Bargaining stage of grief after my little brother took his own life was a cyclical nightmare which only ever had a single ending.

This is my first attempt a VN or game of any kind, and just an attempt 5 years later to capture the guilt and regret Bargaining inflicted over and over. Like picking a scab.
